metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26386 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Previously Firefox for macOS and Linux would download temporary files to auser-specific directory in /tmp, but this behavior was changedto download them to /tmp where they could be affected by otherlocal users. This behavior was reverted to the original, user-specificdirectory.
*This bug only affects Firefox for macOS and Linux. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR< 91.7 and Thunderbird < 91.7.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
